document.full_text: the twin brothers who accused facebook inc and founder mark zuckerberg of stealing their idea for the social networking website lost their bid to have a u.s. court void a multi-million dollar settlement of their claims.
document.title: winklevoss twins lose bid to reopen facebook case
lines_and_colors: the twin brothers who accused facebook inc and founder mark zuckerberg of stealing their idea for the social networking website lost their bid to have a u.s. court void a multi-million dollar settlement of their claims.
